message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product for sale. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking for $200 for it. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could you consider reducing the price to $160?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $200 is still higher than I can go. How about we meet in the middle at $180?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still looking to keep the cost under $80 if possible. Would it be possible to lower the price to $170?
